titles.title: Expressing support for the designation and goals of "National Hispanic Media Week" in honor of the Hispanic media of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
3/27/2007--Introduced.
Recognizes the importance of the U.S. Hispanic press in informing and promoting the well-being of the U.S. Hispanic community. Supports designation of an appropriate week as "National Hispanic Media Week."
